title: Delhi blast: Sadar, Chandni Chowk markets falls silent; footfall drops drastically
description: Central Delhi's wholesale markets are experiencing a significant downturn following a blast near the Red Fort. While Sarojini Nagar market remains unaffected, Lajpat Rai Market is largely shut, with traders expressing fear and livelihood concerns.

description: The Bharatiya Janata Party has strongly criticized Congress leader P Chidambaram for his comments on homegrown terrorists. Union minister Giriraj Singh accused Chidambaram of supporting terrorists and appeasement politics. BJP MP Praveen Khandelwal stated that terrorists have no religion and questioned Chidambaram's past actions. National spokesperson Nalin Kohli alleged Chidambaram is building a political narrative.

description: Teenage sensation Vaibhav Suryavanshi, one of the youngest prodigies in Indian cricket, was the subject of light-hearted banter from older teammates Yudhvir Singh Charak and Gurjapneet Singh ahead of the ACC T20 Emerging Teams Asia Cup. The viral video captured the players teasing the 14-year-old about his age and hairstyle as the India A squad traveled to Doha.

Asmongold noted that hiding information fuels public doubt. His comments highlight how online personalities engage in national discussions. The debate over these files now reaches beyond political circles.

description: Shardul Thakur is set to join Mumbai Indians for the 2026 IPL season, with the franchise officially confirming the trade from Lucknow Super Giants. This move marks Thakur's seventh IPL team. The announcement comes ahead of the player retention and release announcements scheduled for Saturday. Mumbai Indians will become the seventh IPL franchise that Shardul has represented.

This comes as exit polls predict a win for the NDA, with projections showing the Mahagathbandhan falling short of a majority. Police are on alert to prevent any untoward incidents.

description: A flight ticket found in Saharanpur links Dr. Adil Ahmad, arrested last week, to a Srinagar-Delhi trip just before the Red Fort blast. description: Bangladesh's interim chief adviser Muhammad Yunus announced a national referendum on the "July Charter" for state reform will be held alongside parliamentary elections in February 2026. The charter, born from a student uprising, proposes significant institutional changes. This move occurs amidst heightened political tensions following former Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's trial.

description: Investigators discovered a Maruti Suzuki Brezza near Al Falah University as part of the Delhi blast probe. Security sources revealed the bomber, Umar Un Nabi, planned a multi-vehicle IED attack, with three vehicles acquired for the operation. The plot, originating in Turkey, also targeted locations beyond Delhi, including Ayodhya.

description: Discover unclaimed money in your family's name through the RBI's UDGAM portal. Simply use basic details like name and date of birth to search across numerous banks. If a match surfaces, reclaim your funds by visiting the bank with necessary documents. This initiative helps reunite individuals with forgotten deposits, ensuring rightful owners can access their money.

Employee skips meeting during leave: Boss disappointed; sparks debate on work culture
description: An Indian employee's resignation after being asked to attend a meeting on approved leave sparked widespread discussion.  This incident highlights a growing trend of work encroaching on personal time, with many professionals feeling pressured to be constantly available.  The article explores the toll of overcommitment culture and the emerging demand for better work-life balance and mutual respect.

title: Delhi High Court quashes CRPF constable’s dismissal order over ‘drunk on duty’ charge; here’s why
'32 vehicles with explosives': Agencies uncover chilling plot; details of Delhi blast case
description: Intelligence agencies have uncovered a wider terror plot linked to the Delhi Red Fort car explosion, revealing plans to rig 32 vehicles for coordinated attacks across multiple cities. Investigations revealed suspects were modifying vehicles and preparing to execute serial blasts with multiple IEDs, with eight suspects working in pairs assigned to specific cities.

title: Delhi blast: Inside Building 17 of Al Falah University — how it links multiple suspects
description: Diaries and notebooks seized from Al-Falah University rooms belonging to Dr Umar Mohammad and Dr Muzammil Ganaie have revealed a terror network of over 25 individuals. Coded entries, cryptic dates, and mentions of 'operation' suggest a larger, well-orchestrated plan for multi-city attacks, with fundraising of Rs 20 lakh for operational expenses.

title: Ishan Kishan to Mumbai Indians? Ex-India player’s bold statement stirs fans
description: Ishan Kishan's IPL 2025 campaign saw a strong start but a subsequent dip in form for Sunrisers Hyderabad. Former India cricketer Mohammad Kaif suggests Kishan's struggles stem from batting at number three, advocating for a return to Mumbai Indians where he can open. This move, Kaif believes, would benefit both the player and MI.

title: Arteries naturally constrict in winter and can cause heart attack: 5 things to do to stay safe
description: In winter, the body’s natural response to cold — narrowing arteries to conserve heat — has the side-effect of raising blood pressure. That increase can stress the heart, especially for those already at risk. By adding a few heart-healthy changes to the routine, people can stay safer through the cold months.

title: Olympic legend Surya Bonaly loses all medals to Las Vegas thieves
description: Olympic figure skater Surya Bonaly is devastated after thieves stole all her career medals while she was in Minnesota caring for her mother, who is also battling cancer. The burglary at her Las Vegas home revealed broken windows and destroyed security cameras, with surveillance footage indicating multiple individuals were involved over several days.

title: Happy Children’s Day 2025: Best wishes, messages, quotes and images
description: Children's Day, celebrated annually on November 14th, honors the joy, curiosity, and love children bring. This year, in 2025, the occasion serves as a reminder to cherish childhood and nurture young dreams. The article offers heartfelt wishes and messages to celebrate every child's uniqueness and the special spirit of this day.

title: Vibe coding: Meta’s AI chief's advice for teens; 'spend time on this skill'
description: Meta's Chief AI Officer Alexandr Wang urges teenagers to master AI tools, comparing the current era to the dawn of personal computing. He advises dedicating thousands of hours to 'vibe-coding' – hands-on experimentation with AI – to gain a significant advantage in the future economy, much like early programmers did.
